itseems: , it seems that it is the first time that you access the new Beesensor intranet. This new intranet is more secure than the previous one and, for this reason, it is necessary that you confirm your password.
once: You will be asked to perform this action only once and you may change your password now if you wish.
errorTxt: An error has occured while confirming your password, if this error persists, please contact Beesensor
